text: Gregorio Werthein (born 15 September 1983) is an Argentine equestrian. He competed in two events at the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Argentina Category:Equestrians at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Buenos Aires
title: Gregorio Werthein
